creator: eniya@hotmail.com
text:
Hi,

I am using Tomcat 6.
I having a problem while loading DLL by using command
System.load("c:\\myProject\\myDll_JNI.dll");

I am getting the exception:
java.lang.UnsatifiedLinkError: Can't load library: c:\myProject\myDll_JNI.dll

Please note that running the program localy, it works fine!

I have tried to locate the dll everywhere and change the environment setting
and Tomcat configuration without any luck.

Thanks,
Eniya.

Bugzilla is not a support forum. Please use the Tomcat users mailing list for
support.
creator: markt@apache.org
